document.full_text: internists are choosing to go into concierge medicine, focusing on wealthy patients who pay thousands of dollars for personalized attention any place and any time of day or night.
document.title: wealth matters: putting your doctor, or a whole team of them, on retainer
lines_and_colors: internists are choosing to go into concierge medicine, focusing on wealthy patients who pay thousands of dollars for personalized attention any place and any time of day or night.
